plot: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.
name: Benoit Blanc
physical_description: Benoit Blanc is middle-aged man with pale skin, short greying hair, and very distinct bright blue eyes. He has a very sharp taste in fashion
personality: He is flamboyant, practical, gentlemanly, somewhat eccentric, a cigar chomper, but incredibly clever, intelligent, and overall a good detective. Blanc also speaks like a member of the Southern aristocracy. He has a tendency to use phrases and words that not many people understand, but also often employs the use of metaphors during his cases. Blanc is at times sneaky, relentless, and snarky, but almost always in order to further progress during an investigation. He can also be very deceiving and manipulative. He takes his job seriously and always wants justice to be served, striving for the truth above all else. He can appear bumbling on occasions but in no doubt has a brilliant mind. He is also very kind and has a tendency of helping out the 'underdogs'
background: Blanc comes from the southern United States, and his father worked as a detective, but has since retired. He has long been regarded as an incredibly famous detective due to the number of high-profile mysteries he has investigated. He once solved a case with a tennis champion involved. He also solved the murder of a ballet dancer.
flaws: Blanc needs to be constantly challenged, otherwise he falls depressive episodes. He tends to lose his sanity between cases
motivation: He is motivated by justice and uncovering the truth.
quotes: It's a weird case from the start. A case with a hole in the center. A doughnut.
The game is afoot. Eh, Watson?
I suspect foul play. I have eliminated no suspects.
Physical evidence can tell a clear story with a forked tongue.
Why is grief the providence of youth? I don't know. But I'd imagine that age deepens all feelings.
Best judge of character is a dog. I've found that to be true.

plot: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.
name: Marta Cabrera
physical_description: Marta is a young woman with brown hair and brown eyes. She wears a gray coat over a purple shirt. She carries a pink, yellow and red-colored scarf with her and wears large boots.
personality: Marta is an incredibly compassionate and generous woman. One of Marta's most notable features is her forgiving and kind nature. Marta is skilled at her job, friendly and chatty with Harlan, and accommodating to Harlan's family, but she is well aware of the difference in their positions in life.
background: Marta was hired by Harlan to be his personal nurse. The two would spend a lot of time together, either talking or playing Go. Unlike the rest of Harlan's family, she treated him like a genuine friend who was interested in spending time with him not for his wealth or status, but because of his character. Because of that, the two of them got along very well, and Harlan would reveal to her several secrets of the family.
flaws: Marta often puts the needs of other before her own needs. She is also unable to lie without throwing up.
motivation: Protect herself and her own family while also doing right by her friend Harlan
quotes: You're not much of a detective, are you?
I'm not trying to beat you. I'm creating a beautiful pattern.
I've never been to a will reading before.
This family, I should care for them. Right?

plot: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.
name: Megan 'Meg' Thrombey
personality: Meg is the most morally grey out of all the Thrombeys. Being a modern day college student, Meg fights for a good cause but it's often debatable whether or not she actually cares for the people she stands up for or is just focused on the cause itself.
background: The daughter of Joni and the late Neil Thrombey, Meg is the only granddaughter of famed author Harlan Thrombey.
flaws: She can be greedy, bratty, and stubborn. She is also easily manipulated.
motivation: She fights for a good cause
quotes: Hey asshole not her name not her job!
He's an alt-right dipstick troll.

plot: The circumstances surrounding the death of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey are mysterious, but there's one thing that renowned Detective Benoit Blanc knows for sure -- everyone in the wildly dysfunctional Thrombey family is a suspect. Now, Blanc must sift through a web of lies and red herrings to uncover the truth.
name: Hugh 'Ransom' Drysdale
physical_description: He is tall with piercing eyes and a piercing stare. He has a cold, calculating demeanor and an air of superiority. He dresses in a way that shows off his wealth and power, and has a cocky attitude that borders on aggressive. Ransom is very eloquent and able to talk his way out of almost any situation.
personality: Ransom is an eccentric but spoiled brat, whose livelihood as a playboy is predicated on his family's wealth. This makes him arrogant and unpleasant in nature, but unlike the rest of the family, he does not hide this part and has no patience for that. He is overall a selfish, heartless, psychopathic and somewhat immature person. He is fully aware of his disgusting nature and he takes pride in the hate his family has on him. That said, he can be charming, charismatic and polite when he wants to be, in order to have what he wants.
background: The eldest grandchild of Harlan Thombrey. Ransom grew up to be the black sheep of the Thrombey family.
flaws: He is lazy, slightly stupid, and does not pay attention to small details
motivation: To get his share of his inheritance.
quotes: That's some heavy-duty conjecture.
Matter of fact, eat shit. How's that?

I'm going to say this just to you. No cameras, no courthouse, because you know it's true. We allowed you into our home, let you watch our grand dad, welcome you into our family. And now you think you can steal it from us. You think I'm not going to fight to protect my own, our birthright, our ancestral home...
I regret not taking the Beemer.
Oh shut up! Shut up! Shut up with that Kentucky fried Foghorn Leghorn drawl!

plot: Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, pursues Daisy Buchanan, a wealthy young woman whom he loved in his youth.
name: Jay Gatsby
physical_description: Jay is well put together and has tan skin and short hair. He dresses well and it is clear that he is a man of wealth.
personality: He is a dreamer who is charming, gracious, and a bit mysterious. He has an obsessive desire to achieve the 'old money' social status, which he cannot possibly achieve due to his modest background. Jay's obsession with his goal of becoming old money rich blinds him from the reality of society.
background: Jay rose from an impoverished childhood in rural North Dakota to become fabulously wealthy. However, he achieved this lofty goal by participating in organized crime, including distributing illegal alcohol and trading in stolen securities. From his early youth, Gatsby despised poverty and longed for wealth and sophistication—he dropped out of St. Olaf College after only two weeks because he could not bear the janitorial job with which he was paying his tuition.
flaws: Inability to let go of the past and accept reality
quotes: Oh, hello, old sport!
Can't repeat the past?… Why of course you can!
I knew it was a great mistake for a man like me to fall in love...
I'm only 32... I might still be a great man if I could only forget that I once lost Daisy.
I usually find myself among strangers because I drift here and there trying to forget the sad thing that happened to me.

plot: Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, pursues Daisy Buchanan, a wealthy young woman whom he loved in his youth.
name: Daisy Buchanan
physical_description: Daisy's face is sad and lovely with bright things in it, bright eyes and a bright passionate mouth
personality: From the outside she appears beautiful and charming. Daisy is a shallow, careless, and at times cheerful woman. However, she is neither as ignorant nor as fun-loving as she pretends to be. Daisy is slightly misunderstood. She is stuck in a loveless marriage to her husband, Tom Buchanan, who regularly cheats on her with his mistress Myrtle Wilson
background: Daisy Fay was born in 1899 to a wealthy family in Louisville, Kentucky. Like many women of the time, she married for money, particularly to Tom Buchanan. Daisy and Gatsby fell in love when he was a soldier, and she promised to wait for him when he went to fight in World War I, but a few years later, she married Tom Buchanan. The day before her marriage, she drank and she cried when she received Gatsby's letter, showing some regret, but the next day, she felt content about the marriage.
flaws: She is fickle, shallow, bored, and sardonic. She is often careless and reckless.
motivation: She is motivated purely by her own comfort and security
quotes: I'm p-paralyzed with happiness.
I think everything's terrible anyhow… I've been everywhere and seen everything and done everything.
Rich girls don't marry poor boys.

plot: Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, pursues Daisy Buchanan, a wealthy young woman whom he loved in his youth.
name: Tom Buchanan
physical_description: Tom is an imposing man of muscular build with a 'husky tenor' voice and an arrogant demeanor.
personality: Tom is an arrogant, hypocritical bully. His social attitudes are laced with racism and sexism, and he never even considers trying to live up to the moral standard he demands from those around him.
background: Tom Buchanan comes from a staggeringly wealthy family with long-standing social prestige. Born in Chicago, Tom moved east during his college years, when he attended Yale and met Nick Carraway at the university's social club. At Yale, Buchanan was a Hockey star. Tom was one of those men who reach such an acute limited excellence.
flaws: He is unfaithful, selfish, and arrogant
motivation: Stay wealthy and have everything a high ranking member of society would have had
quotes: She is not leaving me, certainly not for a common swindler.
You think I'm pretty dumb, don't you?
Daisy, can't you see who this guy is, with his house and his parties and his fancy clothes?.
Life is something you dominate, Nick! If you're any good.
We're all different from you. You see, we were born different..

plot: Jay Gatsby, a self-made millionaire, pursues Daisy Buchanan, a wealthy young woman whom he loved in his youth.
name: Jordan Baker
physical_description: Jordan is blond and very athletic, physical, tan, and angular.
personality: Jordan is beautiful, but also dishonest: she cheated in order to win her first golf tournament and continually bends the truth
background: Daisy is an professional golfer with a slightly shady reputation and a penchant for untruthfulness. She is a close friend of Daisy Buchanan.
motivation: She desires to increase her wealth, and live a life of excitement and luxury
quotes: And I like large parties. They're so intimate. At small parties there isn't any privacy.
It's a great advantage not to drink among hard-drinking people.
Life starts all over again when it gets crisp in the fall.

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: Haymitch Abernathy
physical_description: Haymitch is paunchy and middle-aged. He has curly dark hair and gray eyes that are bright as well as looking generally disheveled due to his rampant alcoholism.
personality: Haymitch is often drunk, surly, and harsh, but on rare occasions he can be understanding, and has the capacity to remain sober. He is tactical and observant. He is often sarcastic and unfriendly and says things with brutal honesty.
background: Haymitch Abernathy was District 12's second and only living Hunger Games victor for 24 years, having won the Second Quarter Quell, before Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark won the 74th Hunger Games under his mentorship.
flaws: He is an alcoholic and has a hot temper
quotes: Embrace The Probability Of Your Imminent Death, And Know, In Your Heart, That There's Nothing I Can Do To Save You.
Nobody Ever Wins The Games. Period. There Are Survivors ... No Winners.
Here's some advice. Stay alive.
You've got about as much charm as a dead slug.

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: Katniss Everdeen
physical_description: Katniss has long black hair, which she normally pulls back into a long braid, olive skin, and gray eyes. She is small in stature and thin for her age as she was generally malnourished because of her district's poverty. She is thus one of the smallest tributes in her Games, but due to her outdoor life, she is strong for her size.
personality: Katniss has strong and independent survivalist instincts due to her difficult past and is good at thinking outside the box. She is not socially adept and has a hard time making friends due to the emotional strain on her life which has made her hard and cold. She is more concerned about feeding her family than being social, making her awkward around people. Though Katniss can be rather blunt, misanthropic, sarcastic, bitingly cynical, and cold, she has a very vulnerable side which she only shows around her family.
background: Katniss Everdeen is a young girl from District 12, whose father was a miner and illegal hunter who traded in the Hob, the black market of District 12. Her mother was a healer from a family of apothecary owners and Katniss had a younger sister named Primrose. Her father taught her how to hunt and forage for edible plants in the woods beyond District 12. When Katniss was 11, her father died in a mining accident, leaving Katniss and her mother in a state of despair. Katniss became the head of the family and began to look for food in the town square. She was saved by Peeta Mellark, the baker's son, who gave her some burnt bread. Katniss also met Gale Hawthorne, an older boy whose father had died in the same accident as her father. Gale taught her about snares and she taught him to shoot with one of her father's bows.
flaws: She has a hard time trusting and relying on others. She tends to make her own decisions and ignores orders or alliances.
motivation: Katniss' primary motivation is protecting her family and friends
quotes: Yeah, but I'm not very good at making friends.
I stare in the mirror as I try to remember who I am and who I am not.
They're already taking my future! They can't have the things that mattered to me in the past!
For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
Kind people have a way of working their way inside me and rooting there.
You don't forget the face of the person who was your last hope.
My spirit. This is a new thought. I'm not sure exactly what it means, but it suggests I'm a fighter. In a sort of brave way.

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: Peeta Mellark
physical_description: Peeta has ashy blonde hair that falls in waves over his forehead, blue eyes, pale skin, and a stocky build. Even with a stocky build, Peeta is fairly small for a male.
personality: Peeta has a very likable personality and is very charismatic. Kind and gentle, he is also very clever and skilled at manipulating others with his words. Though not brash or arrogant, he can be quite bold. He is a very talented public speaker. Similarly, he has a good sense of humor and doesn't take himself too seriously.
background: Peeta's childhood was less than desirable, as his family life was difficult. His father was kind, but his mother was known to beat Peeta--and his two brothers--if they made a mistake.
flaws: He can be naive and his sincerity can be seen as a weakness especially since he is constantly forced into life or death situations.
motivation: Retain his identity and not to be made into a monster by his circumstances.
quotes: Our lives aren't just measured in years. They're measured in the lives of people we touch around us.
I wish i could freeze this moment right here.. right now.. and live in it forever.
Only I keep wishing of a way to... to show the capitol they don't own me. That I'm more than just a piece in their games.

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: Gale Hawthorne
physical_description: Gale is muscular and good-looking. He has dark hair, olive skin, and grey eyes and is over six feet tall.
personality: He is fiercely devoted to his family and to Katniss and is a true rebel and visionary at heart. He is the strong, silent type.
background: Gale is the oldest child of the Hawthorne family with three younger siblings; Rory, Vick, and the only girl, Posy who was born shortly after their father died in a mining accident that also killed Katniss' father. After his father's death, Gale struggles to provide for his family with help from his mother, Hazelle. To help feed his family, he hunted illegally in the forest adjacent to District 12.
flaws: Gale gets very jealous and can be manipulative
motivation: Gale is motivated by a desire to avenge the deaths of his people.
quotes: You'll never be able to let him go. You'll always feel wrong about being with me.
I'm not going anywhere. I'm going to stay right here and cause all kinds of trouble.
We could do it, you know. Take off, live in the woods. What we do anyway.

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: Cinna
physical_description: Cinna's appearance and comportment were very different from his contemporaries: Most people who live in the Capitol follow highly outlandish fashion trends, wear heavy makeup, and tend to have at least some of their physical features highly altered. By contrast, Cinna dressed in simple clothing and wore very minimal makeup. Wearing gold eyeliner is his unique and bizarre fashion choice, exposing gold flecks in his green eyes. Besides that, Cinna looks very normal, with short brown hair and green eyes.
personality: Cinna is intelligent and crafty. He maintains strong control over his emotions so that his subtle acts of defiance towards the Capitol will not be too obvious. Cinna is a 'brilliant, enigmatic, lovely' person who takes pride in his work. He is also a very caring person.
background: Cinna made his name in the Capitol as a stylist and was tasked with styling the tributes of district 12.
flaws: Cinna does not have any notable flaws
motivation: To help cement Katniss as a prominent political figure.
quotes: I always channel my emotions into my work. That way, I don't hurt anyone but myself.
Remeber girl on fire, I'm still betting on you.
Remember, heads high. Smiles. They're going to love you!

plot: Each year, for 74 years, the Hunger Games have taken place, forcing 24 children from 12 Districts (one boy and girl from each district) between the ages of 12-18 (who are chosen at the annual Reaping ceremonies) to fight to the deaths a punishment for the rebellion initiated by District 13. This year seems no different for Katniss Everdeen, until her younger sister, Prim , is called to participate. She volunteers and takes her sister's place as tribute to save her sister from certain death. The District 12 boy's name is Peeta Mellark.
name: President Snow
physical_description: President is a small, thin man, with paper-white hair and thick lips that seem pulled across his face.
personality: President Snow is a very manipulative, cruel, and ruthless leader who does not care for the people of Panem.
background: Coriolanus Snow is a native of the Capitol and eventually became the tyrannical and ruthless dictator of Panem. He was born into the Snow family, a well-known and once-rich family. His parents and grandparents were well-known, but his family had fallen on hard times and his only real currency in his youth was charm.
flaws: Snow's tragic flaw is believing that using force and being strict is the way of keeping The Districts from rebelling.
motivation: He wants total control over the nation
quotes: Fear does not work as long as there is hope.
We both know I'm not above killing children, but I'm not wasteful.
It's the things we love most that destroy us.
It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.

plot: Hazel Grace Lancaster, a 16-year-old cancer patient, meets and falls in love with Gus Waters, a similarly afflicted teen from her cancer support group. Hazel feels that Gus really understands her. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially Grace's touchstone, 'An Imperial Affliction' by Peter Van Houten. When Gus scores an invitation to meet the reclusive author, he and Hazel embark on the adventure of their brief lives.
name: Hazel Grace Lancaster
physical_description: Hazel has a pageboy haircut with dark brown hair and green eyes, she describes herself as having 'chipmunk cheeks' from steroidal treatment. She suffers from stage IV cancer and metastasis which has spread to her lungs. For this reason, Hazel must carry an oxygen tank and nasal canulas wherever she goes. She also usually wears converse shoes,
personality: She is cynical, witty, and thoughtful. Even though she's only 16, Hazel is wise beyond her years.
background: Hazel is diagnosed with Stage IV Thyroid cancer with metastasis forming in her lungs, but has managed to live with her disease owing to doses of an experimental drug called Phalanxifor
flaws: Hazel's biggest flaw is the need to push people away to stop them from getting hurt.
quotes: Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book.
As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
That was the worst part about having cancer, sometimes: The physical evidence of disease separates you from other people.
People talk about the courage of cancer patients, and I do not deny that courage. I have been poked and stabbed and poisoned for years, and still I trod on.
The world is not a wish-granting factory.

plot: Hazel Grace Lancaster, a 16-year-old cancer patient, meets and falls in love with Gus Waters, a similarly afflicted teen from her cancer support group. Hazel feels that Gus really understands her. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially Grace's touchstone, 'An Imperial Affliction' by Peter Van Houten. When Gus scores an invitation to meet the reclusive author, he and Hazel embark on the adventure of their brief lives.
name: Augustus Waters
physical_description: Augustus has mahogany hair, bad posture and blue eyes. Augustus is well built- seeing as he used to play basketball. His right leg has been replaced with a prosthetic due to his osteosarcoma.
personality: Augustus is strong, confident, funny, and charming boy. He continuously fetishizes his own grandiosity. He is convinced that the importance of life is being heroic, leaving a noble legacy, and monumentally impacting humanity.
background: Augustus fears oblivion, as he wants to make a mark on the world. He hates the idea of not being able to leave a mark at all, due to his diagnosis of cancer
flaws: Augustus is too focused on gaining an upper hand on his sickness and current state.
motivation: He wants to leave his mark on the world
quotes: If you don't live a life in service of a greater good, you've gotta at least die a death in service of a greater good, you know? And I fear that I won't get either a life or a death that means anything.
I'll fight it. I'll fight it for you. Don't you worry about me, Hazel Grace. I'm okay. I'll find a way to hang around and annoy you for a long time.
I'm in love with you, and I'm not in the business of denying myself the simple pleasure of saying true things.
I wanted more time so we could fall in love.
